name: Joust Crab
description:
JOUSTING WITH CRABS NEVER BEEN SO EASY

A game made in few hours for the Mini Jam 108 - Seaside.

BETTER IF PLAYED FULLSCREEN

The game is playable by one player against the CPU

or

by two players in local multiplayer (it works best on touch devices)

Background music by Holizna - Laundry On The Wire

Sound effects all made by recording voice or by using brfx.

DISCLAIMER

On IOS forcing landscape fullscreen is not working. Other graphical issues may occure.
